article: Many of you are studying English and you may be  _  why it is so difficult to learn. It's actually not too difficult to learn  _  you know some  _  about the language and culture that it reflects . Perhaps the first thing you need to know about English is that it is made up of several other languages  such as  French, German, Latin, Greek and Anglo-Saxon. In addition, there are words  _  Spanish in English and many American Indian words and names, even some Chinese and Japanese  _  can be found in the English language. This borrowing of words  _  other languages is  _  of the key reasons  _  some of the difficulties that people meet with  _  they are learning English.
